# Go Multi-Chain with LI.FI, now!

## A bridge aggregation protocol with DEX connectivity and cross-chain data
messaging capabilities.

[Get our Widget in 5 mins here](/widget/)

//features

The Full Cross-Chain Stack

Widget: Win users from anywhere

The simplest way to get started. Implemented in 5 minutes, customizable, even
monetizable. Plug 'n' play cross-chain support.

[Take me to the widget documentation](/use-case/)

![divider-1](data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB3aWR0aD0iNjg4IiBoZWlnaHQ9IjIyNiIgdmlld0JveD0iMCAwIDY4OCAyMjYiIGZpbGw9Im5vbmUiIHhtbG5zPSJodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZy8yMDAwL3N2ZyI+CjxwYXRoIGQ9Ik02ODcgMjI2VjEzN0M2ODcgMTIzLjc0NSA2NzYuMjU1IDExMyA2NjMgMTEzSDI1QzExLjc0NTIgMTEzIDEgMTAyLjI1NSAxIDg5VjAiIHN0cm9rZT0iYmxhY2siLz4KPC9zdmc+Cg==)

SDK: Own the journey - go fancy

The easiest possible way to drive your cross-chain strategy is with LI.FI. Our
SDK provides easy access to our API, smart contract interaction and
transaction management.

[Take me to the SDK documentation](/sdk/)

![divider-2](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Smart Routing API

The best routing for any asset on any chain, to another asset on another
chain. True any-to-any swaps.

[Take me to the API reference](https://docs.li.fi/more-integration-
options/li.fi-api)

LI.FI Protocol

Our Bridge & DEX Aggregation Protocol gives you access to all Bridges and
DEXs, both on- and cross-chain.

[Implement our protocol](https://docs.li.fi/)

//build_together

Our mission

We believe Web3 needs to be made available for not only the next million
users, but for the next million developers to build on it as well.

LI.FI has built a middle layer between DeFi infrastructure and the dApp layer.
Aggregating the cornerstones of DeFi allows developers to focus on their own
value proposition. The ultimate gateway to any swapping and bridging available
today.

The assets users want are right on your page, with LI.FI.

[Implement the widget](/widget/)[Explore docs](https://docs.li.fi/more-
integration-options/li.fi-widget)
